Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class EnsembleThreshold

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.EnsembleThreshold
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IApplyInPlace

    public class EnsembleThreshold
extends java.lang.Object
implements IApplyInPlace
    Ensemble Threshold. The filter does image binarization using ensemble approach. Perform several threshold operations and compute majority vote in the response. Supported types: Grayscale. Coordinate System: Independent.
